Hey, Iâ€™m Andres.
A Software Engineer.
experience.description: I'm a Software Engineer with expertise in designing and deploying scalable microservices architectures within the Azure ecosystem. I leverage C#, Python, and JS to build innovative solutions, from high-performance APIs to conversational bots.
experience.subtitle: Working Experience

jobs.shortDescription: I led the implementation of robust architectures and the automation of key workflows, optimizing the company's operational efficiency. My work involved creating comprehensive solutions that improved both the user experience and internal processes.
bullets: Leadership & Strategy: I implemented conversational bots and WA Flows, leading to a 7% increase in lead generation through workflow automation. With the goal of improving and optimizing the company's acquisition processes, I was one of the initial team members involved in the incorporation of WA Flows into the Botmaker platform.
Microservices Architecture: I created and deployed a microservices architecture in Microsoft Azure, utilizing Logic Apps and Service Bus Queues.

Platform & Process Improvement: I was responsible for managing the movement of every call process in Genesys Cloud, defining the communication logic between distributed microservices. This led to an 18% increase in contact capacity and a 14% improvement in agent effectiveness.

IVR Development with MCPs: I developed a personalized Text-to-Speech (TTS) system using MCP, Claude Code, and ElevenLabs in Python. This resulted in a better user experience by decreasing production costs by 80% and increasing implementation speed by 200%.

Full-Stack Development: To create user interfaces, I implemented React, Astro, and Angular. For developing RESTful APIs, I used C# and .NET Core. I developed unit and integration tests to ensure code quality, optimizing the way information is presented to the call center agent and the customer.

Collaboration & Quality: I collaborated with multidisciplinary teams to design and implement scalable software applications and optimized SQL queries to improve the performance of the company's database processes.

jobs.shortDescription: My primary responsibilities focused on full-stack development, from creating robust APIs to fluid user interfaces. I also focused on process automation and the maintenance of key solutions for call center platforms.
bullets: Full-Stack Development: Developed front-end applications with Angular to provide a seamless user experience and created RESTful APIs using C# and the .NET Core framework.
Automation and Efficiency: Used Python to automate tasks and optimize development processes, while leveraging Service Bus to facilitate asynchronous communication between systems.
Platform Support and Maintenance: Developed and maintained call center solutions on the XCally Motion platform.

project.title: Projects
project.description: I'm excited to share a glimpse of my professional journey! In this section, you'll find a collection of projects that showcase my passion for building robust and efficient solutions. From microservices architecture to full-stack development and process automation, my goal is always to create a positive and lasting impact.

items.title: Bill Tracker
items.descriptionLong: Bill Tracker is an automation system designed to simplify the tracking of invoices and expenses.

paragraphs.description: It works through an intuitive Telegram bot: the user simply takes a photo of any invoice or receipt and sends it. The system handles the entire process in the background, from extracting key information to organizing it in accessible databases, freeing the user from manual data entry and reducing errors.

The heart of the system is a serverless architecture that uses an AWS Lambda function connected to a webhook. When the bot receives an image, a GPT agent scans it to extract relevant data such as the amount, date, and expense concept, returning the information in a JSON format. The original image is archived in Google Drive, and the structured data is saved to Supabase and Google Sheets, offering a dual layer of storage and accessibility. Finally, the bot notifies the user of the operation's status.

paragraphs.title: Real-World Benefits and Value
paragraphs.description: Bill Tracker eliminates the need for manual invoice data entry, saving time and minimizing errors. By automatically centralizing and organizing expense information, it provides detailed financial control.

paragraphs.title: Future Improvements
paragraphs.description: Bill Tracker's growth potential is enormous. A predictive analysis system could be integrated to generate personalized expense reports or detect anomalies. Additionally, functionality could be expanded to include automatic bank reconciliation or the ability to generate tax reports, turning the tool into a more complete financial solution. Integration with other messaging platforms like WhatsApp could also significantly increase its accessibility and utility.

education.title: Education
education.description: My academic background provided a solid foundation in software development, which continues to drive my professional growth and constant learning to create innovative solutions. In this section, I also share the technologies I've worked with, along with my professional certifications.
